attributes.action: End the £18600 salary law needed to sponsor your spouse
attributes.additional_details:
The new family migration law which came into effect from the 9th of July 2012 means that someone who does not earn more than £18600 cannot sponsor their spouse or partner to settle in the UK.

Is love only for the rich? Does that mean I cant love someone who is foreign? What happenned to equality and diversity?

This law needs to be ended as it makes people unequal because of the salary they earn.
